title: Respond to an Audit Finding
description: A program manager needs to create a formal response to a finding from a recent internal audit.

tasks.description: Review the specific audit finding and the auditor's recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager understands the nature of the finding (e.g., lack of proper documentation).

tasks.description: Develop a corrective action plan (CAP) to address the finding.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager outlines the steps they will take to fix the issue, including new procedures and training.

tasks.description: Submit the formal response and CAP to the audit department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager officially submits their response to the audit finding.
